channel.title: How do I change your log in position when you first log in?
channel.description:
Ok, I'm using DeltaScape Source and when you first log in you end up in fally,Right?Right.Well, I want to change it were u die and end up in cammy and u spawn the first time there too,otherwise changing the home.
-Thank You,RangDalton.[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2008, 12:34:30 pm[/size][hr]anyone?

item.title: How do I change your log in position when you first log in?
item.dc:creator: @rangdalton rangdalton
item.description:
@rangdalton wrote:

Uhm, I’ve tried that and it never works it just made it were when you die you spawn there

item.title: How do I change your log in position when you first log in?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

In your Player class:

// initial x and y coordinates of the player heightLevel = 0; // the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper // initialization packet toX = 2999+misc.random(3); toY = 3377+misc.random(3);

Read full topic

item.title: How do I change your log in position when you first log in?
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

Did you compile after you save it?

[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 30, 2008, 06:22:16 pm[/size][hr]could you plz copy what you did in client.java and past it so i can see what you did wrong?

item.source: How do I change your log in position when you first log in?

item.title: How do I change your log in position when you first log in?
item.dc:creator: @sexy_slay sexy slay
item.description:
@sexy_slay wrote:

go into player.java and search // inital x and y coordinats of the player it should look like this
// initial x and y coordinates of the player
heightLevel = 0;
// the first call to updateThisPlayerMovement() will craft the proper initialization packet
teleportToX = 3162;//2965;
teleportToY = 2983;//3380;

just edit x, and y coordinates, save, compile, run server, and you finished =)

Read full topic
